message: You have successfully fled the village amid all the chaos with a few items in hand. You can manage your inventory by clicking the 'Manage Inventory' button in the menu at the top (desktop) / in the dropdown (mobile) or by typing 'Manage Inventoy' in the terminal at any point, as long as you aren't occupied with something else (e.g. a minigame). Give it a try!

Your progress is saved every time you enter a new area. You can also manually save any changes between areas by clicking the 'Save' button in the menu at the top (desktop) / in the dropdown (mobile) or by typing 'Save' in the terminal. Give it a try too!
